casebody.data:
2002-1859 (La. 10/14/02)

Herbert MARKS v. Gregory GAUDET and Allstate Insurance Company, et al. No. 2002-CC-1859. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re United Services Automobile Association; — Defendant; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court Div. O, No. 550-180; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 02-C-578.

Denied.
